title: Maze Rat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, select someone to auto. At the start of the night, you will learn their role, then you may select their night action. It processes immediately, and the target cannot perform their normal night ability.
- During the night, instead of autoing your target, you may give them the ability to auto two people the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a Basic autovest.
- Players are notified that they were autoed.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose the game.
